title: Can't purchase Champ with my IP
body:
Trying to buy a champ when i have sufficient IP but the box is greyed out.

What do i do ?
Restarting client didnt help.

replies.body:
Try hopping into the Legacy Client to make the purchase. This has been resolving the IP balance issue that some players are seeing. Below is a screenshot showing where you can access the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you!
This worked ! Thank you very much !
